content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  October 03 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has downgraded the long-term Issuer Default Ratings (IDRs) of Fifth Third Bancorp and Fifth Third Bank to 'A-' from 'A'. Fitch has also affirmed the companies' short-term IDRs at 'F1'. The Rating Outlook is Stable. A full list of rating actions follows at the end of this release. The rating action reflects an earnings profile that Fitch believes is more consistent with an 'A-' rating. Fitch stil

content: NEW YORK Fifth Third Bancorp will pay more than $84.9 million to resolve U.S. civil fraud charges that it failed to disclose material defects in more than 1 400 mortgage loans in a timely manner after certifying that they qualified for federal insurance.
name: Fifth Third Bancorp
title: Fifth Third in $85 million mortgage fraud settlement

content: NEW YORK  Oct 6 Fifth Third Bancorp  will pay more than $84.9 million to resolve civil fraud claims relating to defective mortgage loans it made  U.S. Attorney Preet Bharara in Manhattan said on Tuesday.
name: Fifth Third Bancorp
title: Fifth Third in $85 mln mortgage fraud settlement

content: NEW YORK  Oct 6 Fifth Third Bancorp  will pay more than $84.9 million to resolve U.S. civil fraud charges that it failed to disclose material defects in more than 1 400 mortgage loans in a timely manner after certifying that they qualified for federal insurance.

title: UPDATE 2-Fifth Third in $85 mln mortgage fraud settlement

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  October 05 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed Fifth Third Bancorp's  (FITB) ratings at 'A/F1'. The Rating Outlook remains Stable. The affirmation  reflects the company's solid liquidity levels  moderating credit trends  and  good capital profile.  The rating action follows a periodic review of the large regional banking group   which includes BB&T Corporation (BBT)  Capital One Finance Corporation (COF)   Comerica Incorporated
name: Fifth Third Bancorp
title: Fitch Affirms Fifth Third Bancorp's Inc. LT IDR at 'A' Following Large Regional Bank Review

content: Fifth Third Bancorp will pay $21.5 million to settle U.S. charges that it discriminated against black and Hispanic borrowers on auto loans  and deceived credit card customers into paying excess fees  authorities announced on Monday.
name: Fifth Third Bancorp
title: Fifth Third settles U.S. auto loan bias  credit card charges

content: Sept 28 Fifth Third Bancorp will pay $21.5 million to settle U.S. charges that it discriminated against black and Hispanic borrowers on auto loans  and deceived credit card customers into paying excess fees  authorities announced on Monday.
name: Fifth Third Bancorp
title: UPDATE 1-Fifth Third settles U.S. auto loan bias  credit card charges

content: Sept 28 Fifth Third Bancorp has reached settlements totaling $21.5 million to resolve U.S. charges that it discriminated against black and Hispanic borrowers in an auto lending business  and engaged in deceptive credit card practices  authorities announced on Monday.
name: Fifth Third Bancorp
title: Fifth Third settles US charges over auto loans  credit cards

content: NEW YORK  June 10 Fifth Third Bank has hired Natixis' John Fisher for loan sales and trading in Chicago  according to a source familiar with the move.
name: Fifth Third Bancorp
title: MOVES-Fifth Third hires Natixis' Fisher for loan sales and trading
